meta.article_title: May 11, 2020 - Five Ways to Take Away an Opponent's Big Shot

debutant.problème: Go to his strong side first, when you get to choose the shot
Serve short to his strong side, bringing him over the table

solution.action: Go deep and wide to the other side

debutant.problème: Fast, breaking serves to the weak side

solution.action: Serve deep and very wide to the backhand so the ball breaks away even wider

exercices_complementaires.description: Low, deep, heavy or varied, quick off the bounce, and to wide angles, with last-second changes of direction.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Serve short to his strong side
exercices_complementaires.description: Bringing him over the table, then go deep and wide to the other side.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Fast, breaking serves to the weak side
exercices_complementaires.description: Serve deep and very wide to the backhand so the ball breaks away even wider - making it very difficult for him to play forehand.
